column5: The Infection and Immunity - MSc course at the University of Leicester is for students who want to apply their knowledge of biological sciences to studying the molecular and cellular basis of infections and the immune response, particularly if they want to pursue research at postgraduate level. The course combines practical and theoretical teaching delivered by scientists and clinicians working in the University's College of Life Sciences, with a focus on lab-based research projects.This is for you if... you want to apply your knowledge of biological sciences to studying the molecular and cellular basis of infections and the immune response, particularly if you want to pursue research at postgraduate level.
